input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: InfobloxNIOS.

update Fixed Address in Infoblox appliance.
The elements under <query> element are used to locate the 'Fixed address' to be updated. If multiple matching 'Fixed address' are found, then all those are updated. Elements under <update> element are desired updated value of respective fields.
Sample items Xml:
1> For IPV4
<items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <ip-address>10.0.0.1</ip-address> <mac-address>00:00:00:11:11:11</mac-address> <dhcp-client-identifier>Value of dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
The Query Criteria that can be follow are as below, to update fixed address. -> network,mask will get all the fixed address in the network. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> network,mask and network-view. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> ip-address <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <ip-address>10.0.0.1</ip-address> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> mac-address <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <mac-address>00:00:00:11:11:11</mac-address> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> dhcp-client-identifier <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <dhcp-client-identifier>Value of dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> extensible-attributes <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv4</network-type> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>true</disable> <name>Name Of Fixed Address</name> <ip-address>10.0.0.2</ip-address> <comment>Comment</comment> <dhcp-client-identifier>dhcp-client-identifier</dhcp-client-identifier> <lease-settings> <lease-time>121</lease-time> <routers>10.0.0.3</routers> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>10.0.0.5</dns-servers> <broadcast-address>127.0.0.1</broadcast-address> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Sample_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
2> For IPV6
<items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <ip-address>2002::6</ip-address> <duid>55:55</duid> <comment>Value Of Comment</comment> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
The Query Criteria that can be follow are as below, to update fixed address.
-> network,mask will get all the fixed address in the network. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> network,mask and network-view. <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <network-view>default</network-view> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> ip-address <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <ip-address>2002::6</ip-address> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> duid <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <duid>55:55</duid> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> comment <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <comment>Value Of Comment</comment> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
-> extensible-attributes <items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <query> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </query> <update> <scheduled-at>2012-12-07T16:30:19+05:30</scheduled-at> <disable>false</disable> <duid>55:55</duid> <name></name> <ip-address>2002::16</ip-address> <ipv6-prefix>2012::</ipv6-prefix> <ipv6-prefix-bits>32</ipv6-prefix-bits> <comment>Comment</comment> <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime>123456</valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime>1234</preferred-lifetime> <domain-name>demo.com</domain-name> <dns-servers>2002::11</dns-servers> </lease-settings> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Site</key> <value>Demo_Site</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> </update> </parameters> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
target[Conditional]: host[Conditional]: Host name or IP address of Infoblox Grid Manager. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets.
user-name[Conditional]: Username required to connect Infoblox Grid Manager. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets.
password[Conditional]: The password associated with the <user-name> provided. Encrypted password can be provided by providing an "encryption-type" attribute. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets. Valid values for encryption-type are: Plain, Base64 Default value: Plain
timeout-secs[Optional] Specifies the time, in seconds, after which the attempt to connect to the Infoblox Grid Manager fails. Default value in seconds: 60
Note: If no adapter configurations are specified while configuring the adapter dynamic target need to be defined under "target" tag.
Description of elements under <query> element:
network[Conditional] Specify the network.
mask[Conditional] Specify the mask for the network. Must be used with network parameter.
network-view[Conditional] Specify the network view in which the network is located.
network-type[Conditional] Specify the type of network, to know in which network type(ipv4/ipv6 search need to be performed). Valid values ipv6, ipv4 [default].
comment[Conditional] Specify the user comment for the Fixed Address.
ip-address[Conditional] ip-address tag contain the value for the ip-address of the fixed address that need to be searched.
mac-address[Conditional] MAC address of the fixed address. Used when IPV4 address searched using mac address.
dhcp-client-identifier[Conditional] dhcp-client-identifier, used in case of IPV4 fixed address search.
extensible-attributes[Conditional] Specify the extensible attributes for the network. E.g. Building, site etc.
duid[Conditional] DUID of the IPV6 fixed address.
Description of elements under <update> element: Update: The elements under <update> tag contain values for fields being updated.
name[Optional] Specify of the Fixed Address.
ip-address[Optional] ip-address is the value for which the fixed address is need to be created. The value is conditional, but required if IPV4 is used . If IPV6 is being created and Prefix approch is used for the address creation than may not required.
disable[Optional] Specify the value for disable flag. Valid Values are true, false [default]
comment[Optional] Specify the user comment for the Fixed Address.
extensible-attributes[Optional] Specify the extensible attributes for the network. E.g. Building, Site etc.
mac-address[Optional] MAC address of the fixed address.Required if address is assign by MAC-Address.
dhcp-client-identifier[Optional] dhcp-client-identifier, when address is assign by DHCP client identifier.
agent-circuit-id[Optional] Used when IPV4 address is created, required if address is assign by agent-circuit-id.
agent-remote-id[Optional] Used when IPV4 address is created, required if address is assign by agent-remote-id.
lease-settings[Optional] Used to give the DHCP options. 1> If IPV4 fixed address is being created, than the tag is as below. <lease-settings> <lease-time></lease-time> <routers></routers> <domain-name></domain-name> <dns-servers></dns-servers> <broadcast-address></broadcast-address> </lease-settings> 2> If IPV6 fixed address is being created, than the tag is as below. <lease-settings> <valid-lifetime></valid-lifetime> <preferred-lifetime></preferred-lifetime> <domain-name></domain-name> <dns-servers></dns-servers> </lease-settings>
ipv6-prefix[Optional] When IPV6 Fixed address is specified by prefix delegation than this value is required, Not required in IPV4. Example : "2013::"
ipv6-prefix-bits[Optional] When IPV6 Fixed address is specified by prefix delegation than this value is required, Not required in IPV4. Example : "32"
duid[Conditional] DUID of the fixed address. Required for the IPV6 Address.
scheduled-at[Optional] Specify the date time on which operation need to be executed. Date and time are represented in ISO 8601 extended format (e.g., 2008-10-21T10:56:00Z or 2008-10-21T10:56:00.001Z) with some restrictions. When the scheduling parameter is used, changes do not occur immediately. Instead at the date time specified in this parameter.

documentation.description: Creates a new Fixed Address in InfoBlox Grid Manager.
